website_summaries.verdict: Get 2 tires for nearly the price of 1, with immediate efficiency.
pros: We love that this tire does not require professional installation and can manage up to 400 pounds
Designed to improve the experience with Craftsman tractors with positive responses from loyal customers
cons: A more narrow design, but still provides stable and efficient handling

customer_reviews.title: Defective tire
customer_reviews.text: Bought tires for my Craftsman lawn tractor. Found one of the tires had a defect, it had a large bump on the sidewall and would not seat properly on rim bead. See pic
customer_reviews.author: rays55

customer_reviews.title: Not so Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Husqvarna 48” mower exactly. NOTE: they put the grease fitting o the same side as the valve stem! Wonderful! Update 3/17/20. Third worn out in one season. Not a good purchase. I now 3 acres. At least twice a month. Sometimes weekly. Tread is gone on one tire and almost gone on the other. I’ll purchase another brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: HB Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy replacement wheels and tires
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 1999 YardPro 17hp 42" lawn tractor. E-clips and washer/spacers included are properly sized. Zerc fittings are seated properly and function normally. Old tires' sidewalls were badly deteriorated so even with tubes installed and inflated to normal pressure, the front of the mower road about 3/4" lower than with these new tires. Lani the Lawn Mower is riding high as she clears our 1 acre yard as she begins her 19th year of service sporting new front wheels and tires.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J. Edge

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace a flat front tire on my Craftsman LT2000 & they seem to be holding up well. The local tractor store wanted $50 a tire so these were a very good deal. The profile is slightly narrower than the stock Turfsaver tires on that came on my mower but I can tell the my mower has tighter handling without compromising any balance or ride comfort. They were kind of tight going on the axel & I had to tap them on with a rubber mallet after greasing it, but overall they're good tires & I'd recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL! Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a great deal! I always have to buy a tube , have them mounted etc. These came with the hub & a tube & air filled! just jack up the tractor & put them on. Great price, the least expensive tires I found were $35.00 each (these were $51.00 for TWO with the tube). Sure was easy!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Exact fit for my cub cadet Ltx 1040. Wheels are grey nothing spray paint couldn’t fix. Easy to install needed to use the two washers provided on each side. Awesome deal!!
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Tires and Wheels
customer_reviews.text: The seller shipped the tires to me promptly and they were just as described by the seller. The tires and wheels appeared to be of excellent quality. But, the wheels didn't fit my Cub Cadet Riding Lawn Mower, so I had to return them. I appreciate the fact that the seller allowed me to return them for a refund. If they had fit my mower, I would definitely have kept them.
customer_reviews.author: Katlin

customer_reviews.title: Good enough and great price compared to buying the factory wheels.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the front wheels on a husqvarna riding mower. The wheels had been replaced previously with generic Carlisle wheels that had plastic bushings to make them fit. Needless to say the plastic didn't wear well. These have metal grease-able bushings that fit nicely. The tires are slightly more narrow than the factory tires and they are lower grade rubber but considering the low price it works well enough and is a great value. They come with the washers and clips needed to install them. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: after a month, about 4 uses...the tube blew
customer_reviews.text: Tire/tube blew out after a month of use. Tire was filled to rated air pressure but the stem has separated from the tube. Must have been either defective or the tube was installed on the wheel incorrectly and the hole was cutting into the stem. Anyway...new tube or assembly as I cannot cut grass on 3 wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: put them on a LT1050 Cub Cadet. Saved money ! the one thing I had to do for them to fit was to grind less than 1/5 inch off the metal tab on that sits right where the rim would scrape on top of the axle assembly. looks like a wheel stop tab? took 5 min to do if you are at all handy. the wheel hight was perfect because now the mowing deck was finial level, the tire that were on it made the front end sit higher then was supposed to and I never noticed until I out these on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MARASTAR Replacement Wheel & Tires
customer_reviews.text: After reading some good and some bad reviews on these I took the plunge and made the purchase. I have been using them for a while now with no problems. The grease zerks were loose when they arrived but the key is to check them before installing them and tighten before use. The steel wheel seems equal to originals. They seem to work well for me and for the price you can't beat them. Would purchase them again. They do fit other tractors too, just check the size before you purchase to make sure they will work. A very quick fix for a lawn tractor with tire or wheel problem.
customer_reviews.author: marco

customer_reviews.title: Zerk fitting broken at hub
customer_reviews.text: The wheel bushing Zerk fitting was broken at hub. These are bushings, not roller bearings, so grease is needed for a smooth roll. The brake was in the threaded part of the zerk & the stub is inside the tapped hole, impossible to remove. Manual greasing was done & I just kept the defective wheel rather than bother to return it. Otherwise, it's a good enough tire/wheel to do what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Vallier

customer_reviews.title: great product, just as described
customer_reviews.text: These tires appear durable, and the instructions were easy to understand, and appeared to be easy to install. Overall great product, I believe. We ONLY returned these because we ended up buying a new mower, and not "fixing up " the one we needed these for. We debated keeping them anyway, in case we needed them later, but decide to return and re purchase if we needed them in the future. SO I can honestly say I would buy these twice.
customer_reviews.author: Liz B

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: We bought the tires as a rider lawnmower kept having a flat tire in spite of just buying a new tire and also having a tube placed in it. As it would happen the old tire has stayed up. These look great and are like my other tires. It’s a peace of mind to know I have a replacement if mowing after the tire shop is closed. I can just switch to the new tire.
customer_reviews.author: beverly worley

customer_reviews.title: Improperly mounted at factory i.e. defective
customer_reviews.text: See attached photos. Unfortunately I only discovered the defect after installing the first (defect-free) wheel, complete with difficult-to-remove (hence single-use) protective cap Contacted Amazon that I was really uninterested in jacking up mower, removing good wheel just to send back a pair, and could we work something out? Amazon "technician" (presumably a bot) said nope, how about a $25 credit for anything at Amazon? Caveat emptor. Carefully inspect whole shipment before installing.
customer_reviews.author: crd

customer_reviews.title: How to make life easy!
customer_reviews.text: Buying these pre assembled has taken some of the hassle out of fixing a problem. My lawn tractor is kept at a piece of rural property 240 miles from home and plenty of miles from anything that resembles a tire shop. I nursed the old tires longer than I should have. I wasted money on stop leak and was frustrated every time I went to use my tractor and found flat tires. Installing these was easy and they should keep me happily mowing for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Ken R.

customer_reviews.title: Defective Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The bearing grease zerks on both rims are a disaster. fittings are loose, damaged and falling out. One fitting was able to be salvaged(I hope). The other was stripped on the male and female side. Zero quality control. Paid a lot of money for nothing. Amazon is getting a reputation of selling defective garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi poole

customer_reviews.title: Had to shim for my mower, but good tires
customer_reviews.text: They rub the king pin on my mower, so I had to shim with some washers to push the tire out about 3/16ths of an inch. This is all about where the hole is mounted versus the sidewalls. Not a big deal, just be aware you might need to add a couple of washers on your mower. Mine is a Troy Bilt Mustang XP 50. Quality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Pharmboy

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Tires look good and work well. Delivered 2 days earlier than promised. Watch video on Utube if you've never done this. Look carefully for best support place to jack up a tire. You can use a car jack but make sure you've placed stops to avoid possibility of machine rolling. For safety, only raise one tire at a time and just enough to clear the target tire off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bargain
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair of these tires and wheels for our Craftsman tractor, and they work perfectly, excellent quality and fit, included all clips, washers, and grease fittings- so be sure you grease the wheel bearings after install, if not you will wear them out in no time! I had checked in with a local tire shop- they wanted $140 to install 2 new tires on my old, worn out rims- got these for $60 for the pair, including new rims AND tires, how do they do it....I only feel bad for not supporting a local business, but geez, $80 cheaper thru Amazon and new rims to boot.
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Both grease zerks were stripped out on delivery, got the tires mounted, attached a grease gun, shot 4 or 5 squirts in, pulled gun tip off and half the zerk ripped off in the gun tip. Checked the other side and it's stripped out in the rim itself. Save your money and go buy the original equipment.
customer_reviews.author: MDWood1

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I had the new tire on in 5 min. The tires fit my old Craftsman riding mower like a dream. I didn't use the E-rings. My old tractor had cotter pins so I replaced them with new ones. I recommend buying grease to lube the new tires. I cut 2 yards and had no issues. The rires gripped well and did not rip up the grass.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Seems like Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are for my Sears Craftsman LT 2000. I measured my wheel hubs and they were exactly the same. 3 inch wide. and the axle diameter was 3/4 inch. They came with new washers an new retaining clips to hold the wheels on. they are exactly the same size however they are not as square as my old tires. This may make it easier for turning. Very easy to install. They were shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria R

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT VALUE AND QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: EXCEPTIONAL BARGAIN FOR THESE WHEELS.....PERFECT FIT, COMES WITH EXTRA WASHERS AND E-CLIPS....INSTALLS IN MINUTES, COMPLETE WITH GREASE FITTING....IT I WEREN'T SO OLD, I'D BUY ANOTHER SET FOR THE FUTURE BUT I THINK THESE WILL LAST AS LONG AS I DO......INSTALLED ON A HUSQVARNA YTH23V42 LAWN TRACTOR WITH 3/4" AXLE SHAFT......THANKS SO MUCH, SELLER!
customer_reviews.author: missouripop

customer_reviews.title: Bearing worn out after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: These tires/wheels seemed like such a great deal, but... Purchased end of Feb 2019. Installed mid-Mar (followed instructions, lubed zirk fittings, etc.). First mowing mid-April. June 26th (approx. 6th or 7th mowing) and one of the bearings separated from the hub... unrepairable. Must be made in China. VERY disappointed. Would greatly appreciate a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: I'd rather use my old dry-rotted tires
customer_reviews.text: I didn't bother installing them. The sidewalls were bulging all over. Very flimsy. Also, I didn't realize when purchasing that these are tubed tires, The tires I was going to replace are 13 years old and fairly dry-rotted, but still appear much better than these. The tread area on these replacement tires is nowhere close to flat, which speaks to the poor, flimsy quality. Pretty bad when something is so awful that I won't use it on a lawn mower.
customer_reviews.author: Human

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Tires mounted easily and had new clips to retain them and multiple spacers for correct fit included. Was nice that they were inflated when they arrived. Very quick to change as its a matter of remove clip and old tire grease axel and slinde new tire on amd replace clip and your done. The only reason for 4 star on overall is one of the rims was bent slightly when it arrived but nothing that affects function. Overall a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement wheels and tires
customer_reviews.text: I have a craftsman lt1500 and the front tire wenr flat during the winter. The tire and wheel were in terrible shape(rusted and cracking). Bought this for under $60 and it seems to work well. honestly only needed 1 wheel and tire. I do like that the grease fitting is on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Replacement!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set back in July 2017 and once the front factory tires finally reached their end point (around Sept 12, 2017), I went ahead and replaced them with this tire assembly. I have to say and despite the tire being a tad narrower, this entire assembly allows for easier turning, a tighter radius turn and a more comfortable ride. Definitely a more cost and time effective means of replacing the original tire assembly. Placed on a Craftsman 42" deck riding lawnmower. TJ
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: These come over filled with air...
customer_reviews.text: These fit my Craftsman LT 1000 perfectly. They came filled at 22psi & 24psi. The factory recommended pressure for my ride on mower is 14psi front and 10 psi in the rear. Having them on the hub saved me the PITA job of mounting them. well worth it. These are cheap Chinese tires. I hope to get 5 years or so before they begin to crack and lose air.
customer_reviews.author: Joe J

customer_reviews.title: Thinner then the originals
customer_reviews.text: Nice cheap quick fix for bald out of aligned factory tires. Put on new tie rods and got the alignment semi better. The rubber seems cheaper then the original tires and they are considerably narrower. Takes a few minutes to change out, most annoying part is getting the old rubber hubcap cover thingy back on.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a Sears mower
customer_reviews.text: Even though I live in a big city, getting small tires mounted is always a problem. Buying wheels when all you need are tires seems like a waste, but I'm very happy with this purchase. The tires included several washers and shims each. As far as I'm concerned, this is definitely the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: One flat on arrival with bad inner tub.
customer_reviews.text: These went on quick and easy but one would not hold air. Since I was in a hurry to mow a field I skipped a return and ran down to the hardware store to buy a new inner tube. The price is right but keep in mind these are not tubeless and you may have issues as I did on arrival. Other than the inner tube issue, these are fine for a cheap replacement.
customer_reviews.author: MacAttack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement
customer_reviews.text: Tires came mounted on the rims -NO assembly required. Even the air pressure was the right pressure. Perfect condition (new), not a single scratch or sign of mishandling. The packaging was great. Also, each tire comes with 2 washers and 1 ring clip (for retention).
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L.

customer_reviews.title: The wheels are a bit cheap and start to rust quick so keep them clean.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't actually use the wheels as they were the wrong orientation for my tractor so be aware of your offset. As for the tires, they are pretty nice, but don't have as much tread as some other brands. For the money though, they are good tires. I just noticed that the rims I took off rusted a bit within a month being in a damp place.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Defective manufacturing design
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I wonder why I buy from Amazon--these are junk Chinese wheels / tires. The grease zerks are very loose and will leak all the grease you try to put into them. If you tighten the zerk, it is turned away and so you cannot insert the grease hose. Very poor manufacturing standard and these deserve to be returned. Never again--I'll shop local tire store.
customer_reviews.author: Cu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? They're perfect, come with wheels,bearings, washers, the lock clips and obviously tires! Why pay just as much for just tires that you have to mount and put back on, when you can in 5 minutes have new wheels and tires and then already have 2 mounted spares! No brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Tmac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, perfect price!
customer_reviews.text: Tire arrived fully inflated in sturdy box. Raised tractor, and slid off old punctured tire and slid these on. Initially I only needed 1 tire, but because the installation was so easy, I replaced both tires. Tires came with same type of washers and clips as was on originally. I had seen prices locally that priced just one tire higher than the price for these two. I replaced tires on my Craftsman yard tractor. Would definitely buy again if ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry W

customer_reviews.title: Fit great on my Troy-Bilt Bronco 17 HP 42" Mower
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and fit great on my Troy-Bilt mower. This mower is about 6 years old and pulling the parts manual from their website, this product description matched up to their parts breakdown. Bought the tires and had them within 2 days. Took less than 30 mins to remove the old tires and install these.
customer_reviews.author: J Aaron Puckett

customer_reviews.title: It's always the little things that impress
customer_reviews.text: It's a little hard to answer the durability question as I just installed them I highly recommend them it's always the little things that impress included was new washers and retainer clip I actually used some of the old washers too to get the amount of play I wanted
customer_reviews.author: NW/PA

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and easy
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace the tire and hub on my mower. I looked into OEM parts. The parts center said I would have to buy several different parts and install them all together to make one wheel assembly totaling over 200 dollars. This set of two for the price was well worth it. No aggravation even came with mounting hardware it took literally 3 minutes to install
customer_reviews.author: Luke Laterza

customer_reviews.title: 3 /4 axle fit,  have a zero fitting for grease, plain bearing, lube dependant
customer_reviews.text: Versitle . Excellent quality when compared to other pneumatic tire wheel assemblies. Consistent quality. Roundness is good. Rubber is better than the average Chinese junk. Wheels have good paint / finish. Is for a 3/4" axle. Perfect for college tables, hard machines running over soft surfaces. I recommend. I am a shop hobby repair guy and a aerospace manufacturing engineer by trade.
customer_reviews.author: Joy H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for my original tire
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly, same diameter and a great value. I would have expected to pay considerably more. It is a little narrower in width than the original tire but it doesn't seem to make any difference in functionality. Very suitable for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tires are undersized
customer_reviews.text: Plus: Comes with new washers (not hardened, reuse your hardened washers) and snap ring. Con: Yire is undersized. See photo. They're greasy now so I'm not going to mess with returning and will adjust deck height.
customer_reviews.author: trailmug

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself a huge headace and buy these tires already mounted
customer_reviews.text: These small mower tires are more of a pain to mount than a car tire, for a few bucks extra these come already mounted on the rim. Just pop off a retaining clip, slap on the wheel, they come with a new retaining clip, pump in some grease and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Pike

customer_reviews.title: Cheap alternative
customer_reviews.text: I've cut my yard twice since installing these and 1 already has gone flat on me. I tore it down which took maybe 2 minutes and found a pin hole in the tube. Now I need to go out and purchase a patch kit and maybe order another pair of tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy

customer_reviews.title: worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I paid full price 89.99 read the sidewall on your tires these fit perfectly removed and installed in twenty minutes and I'm 71 yrs old with arthritis and fat. I will replace the rear tires and wheels next year.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Good price for quality replacement tires!
customer_reviews.text: These tires and rims fit my tractor perfectly. The assemblies were affordable, so I bought them based on the low price. I was impressed with the quality. I would recommend these front tires if you want an affordable replacement for the originals.
customer_reviews.author: chrisluce

customer_reviews.title: Great product--perfect fit for my Scotts 2046 (John Deere) mower!
customer_reviews.text: My old tires were dry-rotted and needed constant air. Rather than replace the tires, I bought the entire assembly for just a few dollars more--what a bargain. I would have wasted more time installing new valve stems and tires than the entire wheel. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: CD318

customer_reviews.title: Direct Replacement for my 15 year old mower
customer_reviews.text: I have a Craftsman 4500 with a 54" cut. It's around 15 years old now. One of my front tire center bushings shattered on the tire spindle on the tractor breaking it as well. As I had to replace one side I figured I'd go ahead and replace both sides at the same time. These was a perfect match for what I was looking for. The tires fit the spindles perfectly which I also replaced with search Amazon for "Craftsman 596873601 & 532403088 Right & Left Hand Spindle Set".
customer_reviews.author: Brian Pennison

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, everything included
customer_reviews.text: The only issue was they were the wrong size for my Garden Tractor. I should have check the size but instead typed in the model 3, completely my fault. The tires and rims were very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Axfiles

customer_reviews.title: Fits Craftsman LT3000 riding mower
customer_reviews.text: These wheels fit a Craftsman LT3000 riding mower perfect. Just like the original front tires 15-6.00-6, and wheels except these are 4 ply, originals say 2 ply on the tires. Durability- unknown - made in China. But fit is spot on, went right on, zero fitting on outside, comes with washers and E clip- don’t forget to grease shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Spokeguy1

customer_reviews.title: One was fine, the other was a different tire and it was missing a valve stem...
customer_reviews.text: Needed 2 new tires and they sent 2 but one is flat with no valve stem. This is what makes internet shopping a pain. Sending it back and waiting for a new one is time consumimg, so I should have just went to a local store and picked 2 up. This isn't worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Great replacements
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. These are 4-ply tires, where the old ones were 2-ply, so these replacements are even better. Came with everything including spacers and clips. Good value for the money. Durability will remain to be seen, but these seem well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sport

customer_reviews.title: OK for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality but also not the most expensive. Did the job and I mow pretty large, rough ground. I did have to replace an inner tube and the one that came out seemed very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Blackdaze

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tires and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Priced great works perfectly. Fit was exact. Complaints about wear is due to over inflation. Fill to correct pressure and they are a great buy. I totally recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris X

customer_reviews.title: 15x6.00-6" Front Tire Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Great ddeal! Tires are slightly narrower than stock. The fact that they are 4 ply instead of 2 ply makes up for the width.They have good tread depth and the ease of having everything included makes installation a breeze. Great value for the money and no time taking the tires/rims some place to have them mounted.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya James

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my old tires on my craftsman mower that would not hold air any more. They came on time, with all the required hardware and fit perfectly. I'm very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tires
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, not anything super sexy or cool about lawn mower tires but I was pretty impressed with these. Nice to have a good qualility product show up well packaged and with all the little extra things to make install super easy. 100% satisfied with these... and they are sort of sexy and cool on my lawn tractor.....
customer_reviews.author: City Ice & Fuel Oil Co.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice over buying tires and then paying someone to install. I installed on a Husqvarna YTH 24v48. Worked great. Added bonus, grease fitting is on outside of wheel making it easy to service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tire
customer_reviews.text: This fit on my lawn tractor (Husqvarna) with no hassle. Used the original hardware with the new tire. Wanted the two pack because the price was MUCH better than the individual but needed the tire right away :( Only down side is I have to get a new grease gun that has a right angle to fit on the zerk.
customer_reviews.author: abcingram

customer_reviews.title: Tread worn slick in 4 months!
customer_reviews.text: Looked good, went on mower fine. I mow about 2 hours every week for the last 3 months. The tread is already worn slick on both tires! Evidently not made of good rubber. The original tires before these lasted 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless blown tube
customer_reviews.text: Received 2 tires 1 was inflated properly the other one had a blown tube and is useless. Contacted Amazon about this and they want me to sit on hold while they called the manufacturer to ask them for recommendations about a blown tube, Sending back
customer_reviews.author: Rattler

customer_reviews.title: Better, no one.
customer_reviews.text: I have in mind a cart project. So i go to amazon and find my parts. Dondt regrets on this wheels. Big, tuft, rustic, hold weight, right for my job. Best value. I aint finish yet but going to end as in my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Cjavyglez

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit for mower
customer_reviews.text: good fit came with everything you need to install great value bought both tires and wheels for not much more than they wanted for one tire locally
customer_reviews.author: johnny hensley

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Works okay for my cub cadet Lt1050. I did have to grind down the tabs on the steering arms because these hubs and bearing housings are slightly different but it wasn’t a major deal.
customer_reviews.author: abrowning

customer_reviews.title: Went flat
customer_reviews.text: Put it on and checked the air. Went 100 ft on flat surface and it went flat and off the rim. They will replace it but won't receive in 18 days. What a joke!!! Had to fill with green slime.
customer_reviews.author: Tgillard

customer_reviews.title: Replace with original size tires
customer_reviews.text: Front tires fit perfectly on my Snapper LT200. Had to use the 2 flat washers that came with the tire because of the shorter offset but tired installed perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit... Troybilt pony
customer_reviews.text: Only took me mins to install.. quick jack up with my car jack.. one bolt and that as it.. looks better than new.. Thanks amazon... cause the local small engine mechanic would’ve ripped me off big time.
customer_reviews.author: Carl mays

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, easy fix.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tires with reasonably deep tread. The hub does not have any kind of ball bearings, but have a deep grease reservoir with grease fitting. Clean the axles well, grease it up and fit them up. They come with a reasonable kit of washers and fittings for universal fit. Yep, the wheels are grey but look like good paint. Nice to have traction again!!
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: A great replacement tire and wheel assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Used to replace wheel and tire assemblies on Sears Craftsman riding mower and have been really pleased with the value and completeness of these assemblies. Highly recommend these assemblies.
customer_reviews.author: heriberto h sanchez

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: Season 2 almost ready to begin ,and tires holding air through winter and tread looks great. Used on a craftsman 42 inch ,19 hp mowing 1.5 acres .These tires do state they are tubed .
customer_reviews.author: michael whitman

customer_reviews.title: A great deal...!
customer_reviews.text: A great deal for the price..! Two sets of tires and wheels for about for about the same as just 2 tires would cost.... These appear to be high quality wheels and tires, and were easily installed. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: ERIC A DAMM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to change
customer_reviews.text: after several failed attempts to repair the original tires, this was way easier and cheaper than trying to fix the flats I was having.
customer_reviews.author: wade daniels

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect Replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Complete set at that price? A good deal for sure. But, tires are a bit smaller than the originals even though stamped the same size on the tires.
customer_reviews.author: llacosse

customer_reviews.title: MARASTAR 21446-2PK 15x6.00-6" Front Tire Assembly
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews, i checked grease fittings and they seemed fine. After installing on mower i found the fittings and hub were both stripped. One fitting actually pulled out of hub when i went to remove grease gun. Returning and will purchase something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Will be back to rate durability, everything 5 star so expectations are high
customer_reviews.text: Look good, fully inflated, no rust or scratches, tires good - straight replacements (although I put decent bearings on instead of the standard bushes they come with).
customer_reviews.author: Nigel B.

customer_reviews.title: Good price / I hope they last.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two wheels and they are a great fit. I like them and the price is really good. One tire has a sidewall defect / break in the rubber. I just hope these last a decent amount of time to get my moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: nukem

customer_reviews.title: So far,  so good!
customer_reviews.text: Installed in about 1/2 hour. Pretty easy directions, even easier if you find a video on YouTube. Cut my front and backyard, about an hour to do riding, no problems! Packaged nice, made nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Blunt Honesty.

customer_reviews.title: Right fit the first time
customer_reviews.text: Comes with new holders and washers which is a plus. Make sure you have no side to side play in the wheel on the shaft and make sure you grease wheel once you install it. Great fit, looks and works well. I am happy. As for durability, with the grease cert in the wheel I will be willing to bet they outlast the last set that came on the mower new in 1980.
customer_reviews.author: David Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great product but may need to make adjustments for a lawn pull behind cart.
customer_reviews.text: Kept buy cheap tires and had issues over and over again. Bought these for my lawn cart. Very heavy duty and do not anticipate any issues. They were too wide and would have rubbed on inside. Drilled addition holes in the rod and added a cotter pin to each side on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Burbank

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I mounted them to my Craftsman tractor and they are just as nice as the ones that came with the tractor. So now I have a spare set of rims with fittings.
customer_reviews.author: Rick D.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: rounded on edges so turn easier and doesn't tear up grass. much better than originals that came w mower (craftman 42" riding mower) easy installation too!
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for the price and easy install.
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! Had more than expected in the box. Came with tubes, all shims, and everything that I needed for installation. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Replacement tires
customer_reviews.text: The tires fit perfectly on our riding lawn mower and were much needed as the original tires were worn smooth with no tread.
customer_reviews.author: S. White

customer_reviews.title: And away we go.
customer_reviews.text: I finally broke down and got rid of that tire that was always flat. I chose these or the sake of NOT having to mount a tire on those small rims. The only issue I had was that I had to put a homemade spacer on the axle of the Cub Cadet.
customer_reviews.author: Macoda

customer_reviews.title: These are not tubeless tires.
customer_reviews.text: These tires are not worth any money. Just after 1 hour of use, the a tire collapse. Had it fixed, then the other tire collapse too. Such a waste of money and time. Regret buying them. Is it covered by any warrantee?
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Easy Lawn Tractor Wheel Replacement
customer_reviews.text: These wheels with preinstalled tires fit my Craftsman yard tractor with original tires of the same size perfectly and were much easier to install than if I had removed the wheel and replaced a tire. The only problem I experienced was a shoddy grease zerk.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cloyd

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and weak metal
customer_reviews.text: Yes they fit... but halfway through mowing the lawn the center hub broke out of the wheel. The metal is paper thin, so it explains why it broke. I put the old wheel back on with the bald tire and finished the lawn. The tires appear narrower than the original, although the size is the same. Doesn't make a difference other than look.
customer_reviews.author: mark lucas

customer_reviews.title: CHINESE POS
customer_reviews.text: SHIPPING WAS VERY FAST AND THE TIRES (TUBE TYPE) LOOK OK. BUT ON ONE OF THE TWO TIRES THE GREASE FITTING IN THE HUB WAS STRIPPED OUT WITH THE ZERK FITTING JUST BARELY IN PLACE. TOOK IT ALL OFF & JB WELDED IT RATHER THAN DOING A RETURN. COMES WITH WASHERS & CIRCLIP. TAKE YOUR CHANCES? CHEAP ENOUGH TO CHANCE IT.
customer_reviews.author: BUYER

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this supplier, my experience, a New tire, its super packaging with all its accessories and brackets.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: So far so good on lawnmower. Reasonable price, good value.
customer_reviews.text: Good - So far so good. The lawnmower handles well with the new tires and they appear to be pretty well made. All the parts required for installation were included. Reasonably priced, good value. Meh - Delivery was a little pokey for Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: ElvisX

customer_reviews.title: One of the two tires arrive flat.
customer_reviews.text: The inflated tire looked good but the other was not inflated and when I attempted to inflate it no air would go through the air valve. So, it seemed the tube was defective and I returned both.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fit 42” Craftsman
customer_reviews.text: They fit my pre 2000 42” craftsman mower perfectly. They appear to be well made wheels and tires.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the original
customer_reviews.text: Would cost as much money to have tubes put in the tires I have. Instead I have new tires, rims & tubes. To boot, these tires are rated much higher than the ones that came on the mower. Good deal all around.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Noto

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Much easier than putting new tire on old worn bearing surface rim. cheaper too and fill valve outside where it can be used easier. Fit older 2002 and newer 2016 Craftsman lawn tractor.
customer_reviews.author: Doug & Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great way to replace the old tires, without having new tires installed on the old rims.
customer_reviews.text: Fits exactly like my original wheels . They bolted right up, and work great. No dealing with getting tires installed on your original rims. This is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy repair.
customer_reviews.text: I tried changing tires before buying this product. Save yourself the time and hassle and just buy these. Great fit working great after 4 mows. No hassle. Craftsman/Kohler 14.5hp rider.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie C.

customer_reviews.title: good tire but grease zirk is on the wrong side
customer_reviews.text: Easy fix for a bad tire and good price. On my originals, the grease zirk was on the other side from the air valve. So the rubber axel cover fit better and did not impinge on the grease zirk. Other than that very pleased with this tire- hub assy.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Jones

customer_reviews.title: Came fully inflated ready to install
customer_reviews.text: These tires came with all the additional parts needed to install them on the front of my Craftsman 17 horse lawn tractor Installation was simple and will have to wait on durability to see how well they last
customer_reviews.author: Guinness

product_meta.title: MARASTAR 21446-2PK 15x6.00-6" Front Tire Assembly Replacement-Craftsman Mower, Pack of 2
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 2Marastar's 2 Pack 15x6 00-6 air filled (pneumatic) front tire & wheel assembly is the perfect replacement for Craftsman riding mowers with 15x6 00-6 tires (Check your existing tires sidewall). you don't need to change out an old tube or visit a professional tire shop, simply replace the entire old or damaged tire & wheel assembly with this one. Marastar’s easy to install Replacement comes with a tube-type 4-Ply rated tire with turf Saver tread pre-mounted on dark gray powder-coated steel wheel with a 3” centered hub length, high-quality oil impregnated bushings installed & a grease fitting. Tire repair & replacement made easy - also included 3 x 0. 08” thick washers & an extra e-clip to make this the practical tire & wheel solution for Craftsman mowers with 15x6 00-6 front tires.
feature_bullets: Tire: 2 pack 15x6. 00-6 tube-type turf SAVER tread - pneumatic 4 Ply rating
Wheels: Solid dark gray steel, 3" Centered hub, 3/4" Sintered iron bushings
Load capacity/speed: 400 lbs. / not for highway speeds
Use: replacement for Craftsman riding mowers with front tire size 15x6. 00-6
Low hassle, low cost solution to repairing or replacing your Craftsman riding Mower tires
Check your existing tire sidewall for tire, hub, and bushing size to ensure proper replacement fit.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars978 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
